name: Smash Telly
overview: Smash TV which used to be a popular arcade game has also been ported to the Amiga by the company Ocean. A fan of the game has also written this SEUCK based version which some believe is more playable than the Ocean Port. If you liked the arcade version then give this a go. For those of you who never played Smash TV it is basically a futuristic game show where the contestants have to fight to the death to win prizes.
